name: OneJoker
body:
**OneJoker** is a library of functions for creating card games and simulations.
It is usable by programmers in C, Python, and Java.

### Credits and Copyrights

OneJoker was created by [Lee Daniel Crocker][1] in 2013.
[CC-0][4]: To the extent possible under law, Mr. Crocker has waived
all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this work.

[1]: http://www.etceterology.com
[4]: http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
